text: Darien is a rich town in Fairfield County, Connecticut, United States. It is a small community on Connecticut's "Gold Coast". There were 21,499 people at the 2020 census. Darien was #9 on CNN Money's list of "top-earning towns" in the United States as of 2011. ==References== Category:Towns in Fairfield County, Connecticut Category:1820 establishments in the United States Category:19th- century establishments in Connecticut
title: Darien, Connecticut
